title: Person Of Interest - Elias & Anthony Brothers in Crime
author: The Machine
comment: A rare thing - bad guys that people actually liked.  Two great actors bringing them to life.  Good job, David and Enrico!!
Maybe it’s just me but Elias is superbly portrayed! Hard to like a bad guy but Elias is the best bad guy ever!!!!

i just recently started watching this show... about a week and a half ago... im already on season 4ep9 when Anthony dies from Elias giving the code to the Brotherhood and armed the safebomb... sad to see him go lol he was bad ass. fuck the whole show is bad ass... everyone is bad ass!

Great video...wish they made one season special story and run through time of their brotherhood, taking over city and all...Would watch every single second of it...Fallen in love with Elias and Scarface especially...so great acting...Miss them

Nice rundown of their relationship and character arcs!  I love vids that balance the audio and visual components to best showcase their connection, and you've done so admirably.  Looking forward to watching more of your videos!
description:
Video tribute to Elias and Anthony "Scarface"
Music: The Way by Zack Hemsey / Everloving   by Moby
